sentence: Trump endorsed Harriet Hageman, the leading Republican candidate challenging Cheney, reported this week that she's hauled in over $1 million in fundraising since declaring her candidacy for Congress less than five months ago.
author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: George W. Bush donated thousands to Trump impeachment supporters Cheney, Murkowski

sentence: Polling suggests Trump-endorsed Republican Harriet Hageman leads Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Trump Rescinds Support For BrooksLatest Mishap In His Bid To Control Midterms
